1.content: You are in your face hugger stage resting in your for 1000 years. You are ancient and still awaiting patiently for your first host, you immediatly wake out of your dormancy as you here a 'This way' from what seems to be a teenage boy. You sense a pressance near by, you hear another voice 'Lets dump him hear' followed by a whine 'Please no'. You feel the tremors in the ground as the wining boy falls to the ground. You feel your egg open reaching the end of its useful ness and you slowly creep out stiffly. The boy mutters under his breath 'They will suffer and I will do it and If not my relatives will'. With that he spots you from behind and says 'Hey little guy' You tense your 6 legs and then you Jump athleticly upon his face squeezing the Xeno embro into his system. You go brain dead and black out while your carcess is still providing nutrients and oxegen to the host as well as the embryo.
1.title: Birth of a Monster

11.content: Your brain activity begins an hour later due to the Xeno being the fastest growing creature ever known. You rest in the cavity of your hosts chest massarged by the gentle beat of his heart. You are done absorbing nutrients of your host deciding to enter the outside world. You headbut the inside of the rib cage making the host scream and wrive in pain. You push your head through his ribs and through the skin enjoying your arrival leaving the warmness of the chest. You slide out with the task of getting food eched into your genes before anything. You spot an ally cat or you could eat the corpse of your old host.
11.title: Become a chestburster

111.content: You slide towards the cat in complete quiet. You reach behind it and you lanch your inner mouth into its side penatraiting several main arterys. To humans hear the cats dying cry and rush towards you carrying hunting knifes. They pick you and you squirm while they grab your neck you growl then they quickly snap your fragile neck. You have died failing the hive.
111.title: Hunt and Kill the cat

112.content: You slide back to the chest cavilty and you worm your way in using your extendible inner jaw you devour the heart and the liver. You are full and you rush quickly to a crevace as you hear humans talk, you sleep knowing your safe. The humans are looking for the cat and are armed with hunting knifes.
112.title: Eat the corpse

choices: Grab the humans and drag them to the hive
1121.content: You sleep 12 hours excatly leaving the crevace you stretch your powerful legs and arms, you twitch your claws and itch your black as night skin, you launch your inner jaw and shreek freaking out the near by adventurures. You spot the cat and you grab it by the tail exposing its under belly, you slash it in half with your other claw drowning out the muffled hiss. You take note of your surroundings of a dark cave with many tunnels and cracks with minimal light. You sense humans near by and a two more Xeno eggs. One contains a Queen the other a Drone. You must hive theses humans for the good of your race.
1121.title: Become a Xenomorph Warrior

11211.content: You come up behind the big human sticking to shadow you grab him and bang his head against a rock. The other human catches you and stabs at you with his knife, you use your tale and you cut it in half. The human falls on his backside and cowers as you draw closer towards him. You grab his leg and the big humans arm you drag them to the egg location you leave them there after you knock out the smaller human by puching him. You devour the rest of the corpes from where you came and you await the arrival of your queen and the drone.
11211.title: Grab the humans and drag them to the hive

choices: Look at the entrance for a camp
Lure humans in with a corpes
112111.content: The eggs open revealing and thier occupents amerge. They leap upon the humans and inject them with the Xeno embryo. You wait for a short while gaurding the Queens host. The drones host cracks through the rib cage and you lovingly tend to getting it out by pulling it through carefully. You place it near the corpes of the hived human and it feasts upon it. You sleep knowing that your Queen is going to arrive soon. When you awake you notice that the Drone has started to make the hive by spreading saliva and mucus over the cave interrior with a bonding agent. You notice the Queens host has been straped to the wall. The host twitches and the Queen emerges without a sound. She slides down and the drone takes to a food source. You go out looking for more food and hosts.
112111.title: The humans get hived

1121111.content: You hear the sound of a young women and man talking, knowing your Queens in safe hands you lunge at the women and drag her in to the cave followed by a brave man as expected. You injure her leg incapacitating her, you leave her on the floor. The man races towards her and you grab him only to impale him upon your barbed tale. You drag his corpes and the sobbing women to your hive. The drone sticks the women to the wall ready to be hived and parks the dead man infront of the maturing Queen now the same size as you. She tucks in leaving nothing accapt blood. You and the Drone eat the Queens old host leaving half a body squirting blood over the women terryfying her. You sleep on a full stomach and awake to find the Queen fully grown attaching her self to the wall with her egg sack.
1121111.title: Look at the entrance for a camp

11211111.content: The Queen is now ready to be an effective leader and ready to prolong your species. She immediatly produces eggs ready to immpregnate potensiol hosts and the sobbing women. She has fainted making it easier to attach a facehugger to her. You make your way out of the cave to hunt for sport, food and hosts.
11211111.title: The beggining

choices: Do you ambush them at the cave entrench?
Do you wait for them to enter the cave itself?
112111112.content:
The queen now being fully grown and mature, starts communicating with you telepathically. She orders you to start harvesting the humanoids you had up until now - since they made the most optimal hosts - in a massed scale.

Out of the cave you charge into the wilderness. You have been alive as a Warrior(Xenomorph) for less than 15 hours, but already your experience and intelligence has started to develop. You climb a high pine-tree on the highest hill you can find, all in less than 3 seconds, and scout the nearby terrain. Pine trees stretched as far as the eye could see. To the east, a large town.

The queen had stated in her briefing, that she could sense a large scale of mental activity with her telepathic psychic abilities, the same as the humans you've been hunting, to the East. The town was obviously the source of this mental activity, as the sounds and smells of its inhabitants reached you through the wind. You could see cars and trucks driving on the roads to it, even if you couldn't comprehend what they were.

But you decided to look for a less populated human settlement to raid first. Alone you're powerful, but in a swarm you're invincible. You wanted to build up a squadron of at least a dozen comrades before you started assaulting the town itself. For that you needed to find a few small isolated human groups. You didn't think this out of wisdom, but out of inborn instinct.

You rotate your oblong, backwards curving shell-shaped head to take in the most of the habitat with your excellent fishbowl vision.
There! A hunting lodge! Isolated and easy pickings. You start jumping from tree to tree, your agile legs launching you from treetop to treetop like a grasshopper. Jumping down 10 storeys, you literally fell down running. Your powerful limbs and steady clawed feet carried you faster than a cheetah through the dense undergrowth of the tundra forest.
Midway you came across 2 deers. Ripping right through them, you sent their shattered carcasses flying with your beastly strength and speed at which you were running.
You didn't kill them because they were a threat, you killed them because they were there and they were in your way. No reason was needed to kill all life besides that of your brethren.

You finally came to a standstill when you heard human voices. A tourist group gasping, taking photo's at a nearby blackbear stood from the safety of a raised wooden walkway. Safe from the bear, not from you. About 10 of them. Old, young, obese, all weaklings.
Neither they nor the bear appears to have sensed you, despite the racket you've made sprinting here. Were the species of earth such inferior biological specimens?

The bear caught your immediate interest. Being the largest creature you've so far encountered, larger than even yourself - a full grown xenomorph warrior-you braced yourself for for conflict. Size wasn't a guarantee of power, but it nevertheless it held a ever decisive edge in combat. You wanted to test whether the creature was a strong as it was sizable. And also, bloodlust rang through your ears; you've so far since being born, failed to intercept a worthy foe.

Breaking cover, you jumped and collide with the bear, knocking it off its feet. Not holding anything back, you proceeded to maul the creature into a bloody pulp.Like carving through a cake, the bear never stood a chance, its size for naught. Wads of meat, ribs and internal organs flew past your ears, as you dig into it like dog digging into sand. It's own claws a mere brush onto your own tough exoskeleton. The creature died so quickly beneath your barrage, that surprised, you only stopped when it had been shredded cleanly in half, its torso horribly separated from its lower half.

Silence, as you watched the bear, dumbfounded that the fight you've eagerly expected was already over. Then the humans screamed. The sight of horror before them. The brutal death of the bear before them and the nightmarish sight of you sent one woman fainting.

You bared your teeth in a taunting grin of death at the tourists. The ranger guide reacted by pulling out his revolver and shooting you 3 times, his shaking hands missing twice and only once hitting you on the right shoulder.
This was your first experience with a human firearm; not being able to make out what happened, you just sat puzzled at what caused the the pain in your shoulder. When he fired a 4th time, you didn't hesitate, now recodnising the loud bang as a threat.

You leaped onto the platform and onto the ranger, his bullets more useless than peashooters, and crushed half his bones when you landed on him. In an Instinctual act of sadism you held your slightly bleeding shoulder over his face, your acidic blood dripping on him and drilling through his scull and into his brain as he could only scream.

The tourists ran. One mother trying to retrieve her baby from a carriage you had knocked over when you jumped the ranger, screamed in bone-chilling horror, as you impaled the child with your serrated tail and held it in front of her mockingly.
You ignored her sobbing and punches as she clubbed you with her fists on your exoskeleton in desperation and looked after the fleeing tourists.

This was an excellent time to gauge the physical abillaties of your human prey.Useful knowledge. So you gave them a headstart.
But you were disappointed that even after a full half-minute they still failed to have run out of your line of sight, their pathetically inferior biological structures made them very inefficient runners. Ignoring the screaming mother you began the slaughter.

You cornered each human, threatening them with clear intent on their life, but each only cowered and screamed, never putting up any form of resistance. You wanted to discover whether they had some secret or hidden defense mechanism like the ranger who had managed to shoot you and even harm you a little earlier. But it appeared that only the humans like the ranger, with iron sticks in their hands that harmed with sound, posed a threat.

Each time a human failed to impress you, you butchered them. You experimented, ripping of differing body parts and stabbing them in various places with your tail in order to see which wounds proved fatal and which didn't. This way, when the real harvest started, you could ensure that the hosts you brought back to the nest would survive to be incubation-fodder.

You spared only the 2 toddlers, taking them back for breeding (since they were the easiest to carry, being small). Trey screamed of terror whist you carried them roughly in your forward paws and walked bipedally on you back legs.

Again you ignored the mother who cradled her dead child in her hands as you walked back to the cave. You needed one survivor to lure the rest of the Hunting Lodge inhabitants to the cave for an ambush. Along with the 2 children, you brought the carcass of the obese man, and ripped off a piece of him every now and then to set a clear trail for the humans to the cave.

With the rest of the Hunting lodge population drawn to the queen in the cave, you'd have your personal squadron of warriors in no time at all. Back in the cave you mercilessly placed 2 of the newly bred facehuggers on the 2 hapless children you had brought and plastered the hosts to the walls, using your hardening saliva. You hoped they would breed 2 more comrades in time for the ambush.

You smiled in malice. Your animalistic mind couldn't comprehend emotion, but your instintcs made sadism an integral part of you.
You squirmed with glee at the thought that the massacre had only just begun.

You impatiently awaited the arrival of the Hunting lodge residents whist even more of your brethren continued to grow and mature into fully grown xenomorphs alongside you.
112111112.title: Go to the hunting lodge

1121111122.content: knowing that darkness is your friend you hide in the cave. as the humans enter you pick them off one by one. finaly only one is left. you want this one for breeding so you crwal your way behind him and subdue him. you put him upt to the wall and plant a facehugger on him and then.
1121111122.title: Do you wait for them to enter the cave itself?

11212.content: Listening carefully as you heard a tremer followed by the Humans screaming and shouting. You follow the noises and find a black bear tucking in to a corpse of one of the hunters, you shriek and grab the attension of the bear who tries to chase you so you lure him to the drones egg. The egg opens and the face hugger leaps out at the bear, who mearly swipes it and kills it. He attacks you viciosly and you try to defend with your tale but he steps on it and rips your head apart spilling dark green molecular acidic blood all over the bear killing him grusomly. Although you killer has been taken care of you have died.
11212.title: Hive a Bear

info.brief_description: You are the last Xeno Warrior. The savour of your race.
info.description:
You are the Xeno in this story to save your race from extinktion you must gain a queen and more warriors and drones.
Types of Xenomorph= Warrior (Male)
Drone(Female)
Queen(Female)
Preatorian(Male)
Predalien(Unisex)
Face Hugger(Unisex)
Chestburster(Depends on Type)

Your job as a Warrior is to find suitable hosts and to fight
Drones build the hive using mucus
Preatorians are the Queens body gaurds and they evolve from Warriors there are only 2
Queens evolve from the last Drone or the first
Predaliens can be incharge of the hive and they gaurd egg areas they can impreggnate pregnant women with chestbursters
